evidence.claim: Mazik Global utilizes AWS for cloud services including serverless computing with AWS Lambda.
The company supports healthcare interoperability by implementing FHIR and HL7 standards.
Mazik provides integration solutions which include the integration of various EHR systems.
Utilizes Snowflake for data warehousing in healthcare data management.
Offers solutions using Apache Kafka for real-time data streaming.
Compliance with HIPAA regulations as part of their service offerings.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes X12 and health data integration patterns; matches API automation needs.
